title: API Gateway with Cognito to Lambda to Amazon Bedrock (Terraform)
description: Create a Terraform application for Bedrock API with Cognito user management, domain restriction, API request throttling, and quota limits.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: Creates a terraform application that connects Cognito for user auth, API Gateway for endpoints, Lambda for processing, and Bedrock for backend services, with built-in domain restrictions and usage limits.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.name: Adesimisola Onitiri
authors.bio: I am a Cloud Consultant working at AWS.
